snippet: Walt Bellamy, the Hall of Fame center who averaged 20.1 points and 13.7 rebounds a game in 14 seasons in the N.B.A., died.
abstract: Walt Bellamy, Hall of Fame center who averaged 20.1 points and 13.7 rebounds a game in 14 seasons in the NBA, dies at age 74.
lead_paragraph: Walt Bellamy, the Hall of Fame center who averaged 20.1 points and 13.7 rebounds a game in 14 seasons in the N.B.A., died.

headline.main: Walt Bellamy, Hall of Famer, Dies at 74
headline.print_headline: Walt Bellamy, Hall of Famer, Dies at 74
